title: 89/445/EEC: Council Decision of 18 July 1989 concerning the acceptance by the Community of Greenland's offer of a supplementary catch quota for capelin for 1989
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 18 July 1989
concerning the acceptance by the Community of Greenland's offer of a supplementary catch quota for capelin for 1989
(89/445/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Commission is hereby authorized to accept the offer of a supplementary quota of 8 000 tonnes of capelin off East Greenland against compensation as provided for in Article 3 (2) of the Protocol on the conditions relating to fishing.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 July 1989.
For the Council
The President
E. CRESSON
